trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Baton Rouge
There were no other sightings in Baton Rouge on or around September 7th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsAbout 9:50 to 10:00 pm, Saturday night (Sept. 7) My son and I went outside. I walked out onto my driveway and noticed a bright light in the northern sky. I mentioned to my son, who was still under the carport, that there's a bright light up in the sky. After I said it, the light faded out or ascended. My son didn't see it.It did not move in any direction, just looked like it ascended or faded off. The light was about as bright as a planet. This is the 3rd time I've seen this. The first time was 2 summers back, about 7:00 pm and the second sighting was last October, around 10:00 pm, all were in the same location in the sky. A few details about my house: the front faces west, there are a lot of commercial aircraft that fly over, the space shuttle used to fly over when it landed in Florida, and I've seen the ISS fly over (I get an update from NASA on my iPhone when its due to fly over). Just wondering what you may think of this. Thanks, Charles Irwin
Summary: Bright, Star-like in the northern sky. Observed for less than a minute, then it faded out or ascended
